attributes.action: The Right to walk our Dogs on Lead or Off on our Beaches all Year Round
attributes.additional_details:
It seems really unfair to People who have dogs cant walk their dogs on all beaches in the UK. we are Tax Payers and i think have more responsablity than the Person who just comes down to the West country for the weekend leaves loads of litter and that seems to be fine.

If we can get enough of us who have Dogs to vote for this Petition to give us the Right as Tax Payers to visit any Beach in the UK and Walk our Dogs. also it seems Alright for Hores to Gallop up and down Beaches anytime of the Year.

Lets have our say and Lets give our Pooches the right to enjoy the freedom they all deserve, Run Play and Enjoy the Beaches and Sea.

rejection.details: This is an issue for local government and you may wish to address your request to your local authority.
